product.title: Self Control
product.description: In Self Control, you have to take pictures with your coworkers during a party
product.history: This game was made with Unity. I did it with 4 friends during the Pixel Challenge, a 47 hours game jam in Quebec city. I was the only programmer. I did the game system, the sounds and graphic integration, but also some game design. It was the smoothest game jam I've ever made. I even had enough time to code a cool end and a nice menu !

features.feature: One of the best RPS's free game of the week (04/15/2017)
Won the honorable mention in Pixel Challenge student category (2nd place)
